comments.body: This `doc_url` and `dev_url` look to be incorrect

You're correct! Must have been a copy/paste error, the correct urls should be: https://github.com/Foloso/MixSimulator 

Should I do an update PR?

You'll need to open a PR in your person fork of the feedstock (https://github.com/conda-forge/mixsimulator-feedstock). You can just increment the build number as well and rerender the feedstock to update the README and other metadata. Let me know if you need any assistance or to take a look at the PR.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +34,38 @@  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  doc_url: https://facebookresearch.github.io/nevergrad/
  dev_url: https://github.com/facebookresearch/nevergrad

comments.body:
I opened a PR upstream to deal with having to manually package the license file (https://github.com/Foloso/MixSimulator/pull/5). 

Please check this upon the next release to see if you can drop manually packaging the license file.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@  home: https://github.com/Foloso/MixSimulator
  summary: Python application with nevergrad optimization model for calculating and simulating the least cost of an energy Mix under constraints.
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
